item.title: CVE-2022-1561: Crafted backend urls
item.description: There is a new vulnerability in the Lura Project software (which is the KrakenD’s engine). We have immediately corrected the problem in the subsequent release after its report. Please upgrade to the latest version. We have also submitted the CVE-2022-1561 Vulnerability description URL params not sanitized correctly in the package github.com/luraproject/lura/v2/router/gin allow a malicious user to alter the backend URL defined for a pipe when remote users send crafty URL requests.
